nightSpawnMod.desc:: Percentage of how many more monster can appear at night, default: 30

baseMonsterCap.desc:: Base monster cap to act upon, this is the value it'll increase from/reduce to at the start/end of the night. Increase this to see more monsters in the world, default(Vanilla): 70

minSleepTime.desc:: Min time required to sleep, vanilla min time:12500, Midnight is 18000
